tags: and after this i shall leave all my belongings and join the priestess of the red god
r'hollor shall never find a more dedicated priestess than myself
the lord of light is blessing us
summary: HAIL TO R'HLLOR, LORD OF LIGHT, FOR AFTER ENDLESS MONTHS OF SILENCE HE RETURNS TO ILLUMINATE OUR CLOUDY NOVEMBER WITH A EW COVER...
body: HAIL TO R'HLLOR, LORD OF LIGHT, FOR AFTER ENDLESS MONTHS OF SILENCE HE RETURNS TO ILLUMINATE OUR CLOUDY NOVEMBER WITH A EW COVER BRIGHTER THAN THE SUN ITSELF! CEASE THIS LONG-LASTING-SILENCE OVER US, FOR WITH THE POWER OF OUR FANDOM WE ARE ABLE TO REACH OUR ENEMIES (ANTIS AND J0NSA IN PARTICULAR) AND DESTROY THEM! THE NIGHT IS DARK AND FULL OF TERRORS (AND UNRELIABLE LEAKS) BUT YOURS ARE THE POWER AND THE GLORY OF THE CANON, R'HLLOR FILL US WITH YOUR FIRE.

tags: i just want ghost drogon and rhaegal alive guys
save the direwolves and the dragons
i still hate d&d for what they did to viserion
body:
About the new EW cover…

I’ve made peace with the fact that this Jonerys vs Jonsa war will never end sooooo… even if I don’t support ships (but I don’t have any problem with all those fans that respectfully ship whoever they want and let other people ship whoever they want without insulting them) Dany is one of my favorite characters, so I’ll just sit here and enjoy watching the world burn with all those Dany haters going insane with the new cover and explaining why a picture of Dany and Jon together reinforces Jonsa will be endgame (?)… I seriously want their imagination and creativity guys, it’s amazing 😂

Edit: and btw, I’m just going to add this because some people are wild! 😂 As a character I love how Sansa has evolved since season one but what I can’t stand are the fans that hate any other character and use their hate to insult people or post their hate in the tags I follow and no, I have never said anything bad about Sansa or that she sucks just because I like Dany. If you don’t like Daenerys or Sansa or whoever you want it’s ok, write posts about why you don’t like certain character with all the mature reasons you have, but don’t come here and insult people or write bs just because they like a different character or that character “intervenes” with your ship. And yeah, this always goes both ways because there are Jonerys fans that do the same thing and those are the posts I’m talking about, the Dany/Sansa haters that post bs about those two characters just because they want one of them with Jon. I mean, at this point all of them could die lmao and I repeat, all those respectful Jonsa or Jonerys or Jonwhateveryouwant fans that can coexist and discuss like adults are great and I don’t have any problem with them and their posts, ship and let ship and be happy. But when I have to read about how Dany is a bitch or is crazy or is a bad character just “BECAUSE JONSA IS ENDGAME AND YOU ARE WRONG AND THAT’S ALL THAT MATTERS” in the tags I follow is exactly the moment in which I’m just going to sit and laugh about how their world is upside down when something with Dany and Jon appears, and no, I’m not going to insult them neither just “to defend Daenerys” or any other fictional character I like.

I have friends that don’t like Dany because whatever reasons they have or that ship Jon and Sansa and I don’t have any problem with them. I love them and no, I’m not going to insult them or stop talking to them because I like Dany or I don’t like ships… and if my decision to not insult them and better laugh about it is “hypocrisy at it’s finest” to some of you, then so be it 🤷🏻‍♀️

Edit 2: aaaand yes, I have erased some tags because it seems some people understand whatever they want and now, at least for them, I’m calling all shippers delusional… 🙄

title: I don't wanna share
description:
by visenyathedragoness

A girl shows up at Castle Black claiming to be Arya Stark. But Arya isn’t the little girl Jon remembers, nor is he the sweet boy from her childhood. But if they have to deal with being monsters, then they best do it together. After all, they always were the outcasts.

Words: 1153, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Underage
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Jon Snow, Arya Stark
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Incest, Violence, Dark, Reunions, Sexual Content, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence

summary: Did the EW editing staff suddenly felt like making Kit look more like canon!Jon (and completely forgot to Dodge&Burn Emilia's...
body:
BUT CAN WE TALK ABOUT HIS EYES?!

Did the EW editing staff suddenly felt like making Kit look more like canon!Jon (and completely forgot to Dodge&Burn Emilia’s puffy red eyes)?

Or is it maybe smth that happens show-wise??????? Some magical act that changes his eye colour??? Warging a dragon burns his eye colour to more lilac-like??? Something to do with Ice Zombies and their connection to the Starks and Jon doing some magical shtik that makes his eyes look dead/cold??? Jon becoming blind?????????

I’m running crazy with theories…

tags: not really anti dany but you never know
summary: Looks splendid and I am totally not mad about this J0nerys cover, The costumes as always are incredible. Hats off to Michelle...
body:
On the new GoT EW cover

Looks splendid and I am totally not mad about this J0nerys cover, The costumes as always are incredible. Hats off to Michelle Clapton once again!

But I do have to wonder why J0nerys fans aren’t concerned about ENDGAME being spread over the cover. I mean, had that been a Jonsa cover I would have been really concerned. It’s almost like a huge hint that J0nerys won’t be endgame at all. Sure, they’re canon for now but endgame?? Really? That cover would not have gone through GoT PR without serious consideration for what the GA would think. @trinuviel has a great analysis on Dany’s costume. Before I go into any criticisms, I do have to say that without context Winter Coat 2.0 is beautiful. 

I do have to agree with @trinuviel though, Dany does look like an outsider very much. Winter Coat 2.0 doesn’t look welcoming at all. I mean, I had read this question on Quora on how the other Starks will react to Dany and crew coming to Winterfell. And if she shows up in this, the Wolves will not be all too welcoming to the woman who kept their brother-cousin prisoner. The red seeping through could mean that no matter what, she can’t hold back on her Targaryen insanity. I do see her wearing this when she inevitably threatens to burn some Northern Lords. If J0nerys was truly endgame, I do think she would be in an dark ensemble like the other Starks and to differentiate, she could use some red. 

Something like this, but a fur version. A winter coat version. She would blend in with the North and still be seen as a queen with the overarching belt. But she doesn’t. Dany has to stand out, she wants to stand out.  

The fact that she’s coming North with outfits prepared, proves that Sansa will not be making anything for her. Dany probably already has a wedding dress commissioned for whatever she believes will happen between her and Jon. I also believe that she has a cloak being made for Jon too. I think she’ll present it to him either before or after his parentage is revealed. Honestly, a small action Jon could do that would solidify his status as a Stark is him choosing Sansa’s cloak instead of Dany’s. But tis a small dream. 

Nonetheless, this coat being white means that she will not see herself as a Targaryen wishing to be married to a Stark, her wish is to be a Targaryen alone. 

WC 2.0 means she’s conquering the North, she’s taking it and she has no regard for their customs. 

As for Jon’s cloak on the cover, I mean it’s not new. It’s the same one from Season 7. I can’t really say much about it. He’s not wearing the normal Stark jerkins like Ned’s or Robb’s or hell Arya’s. Meaning, he knows at that point that his father is Rhaegar but he still wants to be a Stark. That is one thing Jon will always want. (hence keeping his King cloak but not the first one Sansa made in Season 6 with the Stark sigil) 

But let me get into the blocking of this shoot. I love that Jon and Dany look so much older than their Season 1 versions. They have grown physically and mentally. They’re no longer young and naive. They have been through a lot and that is so visible in their faces. This is Kit and Emilia 8 years older. Makeup and photoshop could have made them look younger, but they didn’t. 

D&D want us to know that Jon has had enough. He’s pissed. He’s tired. He’s annoyed. In my opinion, he doesn’t look protective of Dany. Had Jon been protective, his eyes would be wide open with different eyebrow positioning. If anything, it looks like it’s the other way around. Emilia is showing a hint of a “smize.” As if conveying curiousity, despite knowing the threat of the WWs, there is still much to learn about the North. This promotional photo tries to make them look like an attractive couple to ship, like D&D want you to fall back into the trap so when the twist that Jon and Dany do not end up together, it’ll be more of a shock. But most of the GA find J0nerys as “gross” because of the incest. Even people who don’t watch the show know that this is an incestual relationship. (Jonsa is an incestual relationship but les be real, cousin relationships are more accepted in the Westeros) 

(I’m getting a little meta here but WC2.0 being white and red could symbolize the ice and fire ultimate cage match. This could mean that Dany sees herself as the sole savior of Westeros. Yes, she needs Jon to help get the North on her side later on but in her mind it’s her dragons and her armies coming to save the North. This whole time, we’ve seen Jon as the one to fight the NK, and Jon sees it that way too. With the loss of Viserion, Dany might see it as her against the NK. Who knows when they’ll find out about him having a dragon.)

All in all, as a Jonsa stan and a House Stark stan, I am not concerned about this photoshoot at all. They had the first photo together, but Jonsa had the first footage of Season 8 and Jon doesn’t look mad in it at all.

This whole time, we’ve seen Jon as the one to fight the NK, and Jon sees it that way too. With the loss of Viserion, Dany might see it as her against the NK. All in all, as a Jonsa stan and a House Stark stan, I am not concerned about this photoshoot at all. They had the first photo together, but Jonsa had the first footage of Season 8 and Jon doesn’t look mad in it at all.
